mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) VALUES (#{seckillId},#{userPhone});
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id "seckillInventory.seckill_id", s.name "seckillInventory.name", s.number "seckillInventory.number", s.start_time "seckillInventory.start_time", s.end_time "seckillInventory.end_time", s.create_time "seckillInventory.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckillinventory s ON sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId};
